reviews.review: Хоошое продолжение portal,много всего интересного,эта игра дает мозгу подумать,так как в этой игре много сложностей, концовка очень интересная,интересней всего проходить комнаты с друзьями,советую всем купить эту игру)

I have played a lot of great games; I've played ocarina of time, wind waker, super mario world, every assasins creed. every halo, world at war, oblivion, metroid 3, earthbound, and HL 2, but I can confidently say Portal 2 is the best game ever made.

非常经典耐玩的好游戏，虽然已经上市很久，但可玩性依旧不减。
尤其是地图编辑器非常给力，给这个游戏增添了无尽的可能。我本来以为只能设计解密地图，结果昨天和基友还玩到了一张竞速地图，非常有创意。
趁打折买的，感觉很超值啊。推荐和基友一起愉快的玩耍。
非常期待portal3的推出

A wonderful co op game!
Really enjoyable!
9/10!

When I had played Portal 2 three years ago on PlayStation 3, I thought it was the best game I have ever played. Replaying it on the PC, I experienced more of Portal 2 and it felt like I was playing for the first time. The story is great, the level design was sweet, the humor was excellent, and the boss battle has got to be the best boss battle I had fought. All in all, the game is one of my top five personal favorite games of all time.
Say hi to the camera.

Um dos jogos mais engraçados que joguei até hoje =)... Com montanhas de puzzles complexos envolvidos numa história fantástica.....Este jogo devia ser comprado só pelo final, depois de tanto pensares para completares os puzzles, o fim acaba de forma a deixar-te completamente satisfeito com o jogo.... Definitivamente recomendo a quem ainda n jogou!

Прекрасная, очень атмосферная игра с чудесным сюжетом, интересными, порой сложными тестовыми камерами и отличным кооперативом. Всем играть.

Again, this game is... well really good. Really, REALLY good. Er... there is no cake, well there wasn't really cake in the first one but now there REALLY isn't... any cake. But um... there are potatos, lot's of them... AND BIRDS, well one bird... pretty sure it's a crow. Oh oh oh and a gun that makes holes, colourful ones. And this guy who talks about lemons, oh, not him just his voice you see... he isn't real er, well he was or maybe he is? Anyway good game, um... I think there is a bug, when you have to speak you just jump, and you can't say apple for some reason... wait... what, no. STOP SAYING THAT. no i'm not, no no no no no... I AM NOT A MORON!!!!
This Is absolutly one of my favorite games

J'ai déjà fini, ce jeu, malgrès l'achat datant d'il y a quelques heures et c'est un très bon jeu!
Personellement j'adore tout les jeux VALve!
Mais ce Portal est une réussite, avec l'éditeur de niveau et la co-op très réussi!
Donc foncez sur Portal 2, il est beaucoup plus long que Portal 1!
Attendez une offre ou achetez-le a 20e c'est toujours moins cher que le jeu pour pigeon (COD a 70e)..
Les DLC's sont gratuits en plus!

This game is one of the most incredible FPS game I've ever played.I really love the Computer Core GlaDos, she always make lots of joke, yet I just can understand some of it. If you wanna play this game you gonna clear your mind and get ready to solve these amazing puzzle. Multiplayer mode is a spotlight of this game, you need to communicate with you friend and solve problems together, I'll give this game 9.5 cause this game told me that FPS game can also use your brain not just shot somebody on the face.
